name: Wanikani: Forum Transparency 2.0
description:
This is the new version of the transparent theme for our beloved Wanikani forums. It makes the forums prettier and allows you to use your own background image (or color).
You can find the old one on its forum page, or on its userstyles.org page.
For bug reports or suggestions, please contact me either on the forums or through my email address. These are provided below.
Forums: https://community.wanikani.com/t/userstyle-forum-transparency-20/32287 Email: kumi@kumirei.com
